name: Jordan Celton
title: Web Developer
aboutText: After several years in another field, I decided to switch careers and pursue web development, specifically as a web integrator. This choice was driven by my passion for creating websites and my desire to combine creativity and technology. Today, I truly enjoy building modern, user-friendly websites that meet users' needs. Each project is an opportunity for me to learn, face new challenges, and improve my skills.
designWebText: Creating modern and intuitive designs tailored to the needs of users and businesses.
integrationWebText: Integrating responsive websites optimized for all screen types, using best web practices.
developmentFrontEndText: Developing user interfaces, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience for visitors.
optimizationPerformanceText: Improving website speed and performance for fast and smooth navigation.

educationList.description: Intensive training as a web integrator, learning front-end and back-end technologies, and completing multiple hands-on projects.

educationList.degree: Technical Baccalaureate in Machining - Lycée Le Likes
educationList.description: Obtained a Technical Baccalaureate with a specialization in machining techniques at Lycée Le Likes, developing skills in programming and industrial manufacturing.

experienceList.description: Developing websites and web applications for clients in various sectors, using modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

projects.title: Ohmyfood
projects.description: Learning objectives: mobile-first design, CSS animations, maintainable code with Sass, and version control with Git and GitHub.

projects.title: Interior Architect Portfolio
projects.description: Developed a dynamic webpage for an interior designer's site with JavaScript. API interaction, dynamic page creation, and use of tools like Figma and Visual Studio Code.

projects.title: Kasa Site Redesign
projects.description: Implemented the front end of an application with React and React Router. Developed components, managed navigation, and used simulated data from a JSON file.

projects.title: Nina Carducci - SEO Optimization
projects.description: Improved website SEO by enhancing performance and accessibility. Analyzed issues, implemented improvements, and created a report detailing before/after results.

projects.title: 724events - Debugging and Testing
projects.description: Debugging and finalizing a one-page site. Code analysis, bug fixing with Chrome DevTools and React Developer Tools, test documentation, and project management with Yarn.

projects.title: Argent Bank - User Dashboard
projects.description: Developed the front end of a banking application with React and Redux. API integration, responsive user interface creation, and global state management with Redux.

projects.title: Menu Maker - Qwenta
projects.description: Developed the **Menu Maker - Qwenta** project, an online tool for restaurateurs to create and customize menus.

projects.title: LP Paysages - Showcase Website
projects.description: Development of the showcase website for LP Paysages, a company specializing in the creation and maintenance of gardens and green spaces.

projects.title: Site e-commerce
projects.description: Reproduction d'une maquette de site e-commerce en React et SASS :
